methods.name: public void postCompileStep(Compiler compiler)
methods.comment:
* Figure out if we're executing a toplevel expression.
   * If so, we can't be inside of a predicate.

methods.name: public int getPositionInContextNodeList(XPathContext xctxt)
methods.comment:
* Get the position in the current context node list.
   *
   * @param xctxt Runtime XPath context.
   *
   * @return The current position of the itteration in the context node list, 
   *         or -1 if there is no active context node list.

methods.name: public XObject execute(XPathContext xctxt) throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
methods.comment:
* Execute the function.  The function must return
   * a valid object.
   * @param xctxt The current execution context.
   * @return A valid XObject.
   *
   * @throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

methods.name: public void fixupVariables(java.util.Vector vars, int globalsSize)
methods.comment: * No arguments to process, so this does nothing.
